subject: Capital One Bank
body:
Capital One Bank
Address: 299 Park Ave, New York, NY 10171, United States
Website: https:/ /www.capitalone.com/ 
e-mail: 
infodeskpayment101@mail.com
Phone: +1 (646) - 346 - 6858
Greeting Unpaid Beneficiary,
I am Mr. Richard D. Fairbank; CEO, Capital One Bank. We have received several reports that lots of foreigners have been deceived and huge amounts have been lost to syndicates. We have recovered over (USD922 Million) from the people we have apprehended. We, the Capital One Bank have received a mandated instruction letter from the Federal Reserve Bank New York to release your inheritance part payment of (US$2.5M) to you. And we are willing and ready to release the amount to you as advised by the above stated finance firm. But due to the issues or problems facing global inheritance wire transfers in demanding different kinds of documents by numerous impostors and impersonators before the successful completion of your transaction, we have decided to release your fund through the fastest way of Bank to Bank Telegraphic Wire Transfer or ATM Visa Card/Master Card. And it has been approved by the U.S government authority under the supervision of the FBI, CIA and Interpol which has been endorsed by these mentioned authorities, been for the immediate release of your fund within few working days as soon as you meet up with compliance as follows:-
(1) Your full name:
(2) Residential Address:
(3) Direct/ Cell Phone number:
(4) Current occupation:
(5) Marital Status/Age/Gender:
(6) Attached a copy of your working I.D/driverâ€™s license:
(7) Your WhatsApp Number:
Finally, you are advised to get back to me and I promise to help you so that you will receive your abandoned fund without any further delay. Note that the only thing required from you is to obtain Non-Resident Fund Clearance Certificate which will cost you US$50 only, after you obtain the Certificate the Transferred will immediately commence. If you are still willing to receive your funds. We're very sorry for the inconvenience this may cause you. Please accept our candid apology. Your quick response will be mostly appreciated.
Yours in service,
Mr. Richard Dana Fairbanks
CEO, Capital One Bank (USA)

subject: Re:   Capital One Bank
body:
Hello Mr. Richard Dana Fairbanks,

Thank you for reaching out to me from Capital One Bank. I appreciate your concern about the reports of people being deceived and losing money. It's important to be cautious in today's digital world.

I'm interested in learning more about the process you mentioned for releasing my part payment. Could you please provide me with some additional information? Specifically, what is the Fund Clearance that you mentioned? How does it work and why is it necessary?

Also, I would like to know more about the options for receiving my funds - the Bank to Bank Wire Transfer or the ATM Visa Card Master Card. What are the differences between these two methods? Which one do you recommend and why?

I look forward to your response and thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
James

From the desk of Mr. Richard D. Fairbank; CEO, Capital One Bank. Thanks for you're immediate e-mail response concerning your fund $2,500,000.00 US Dollars payment transfer processing to acknowledge you that all arrangement have been completed by our bank online payment department for the payment Release of your fund $2.5 Millions US Dollars as mandated by the Fund Origin department. Regarding on your question, I want you to know that you're Fund was Release by the United Nations Humanitarian Group as an inheritance Winning Contract Fund, which was attached with your e-mail to our bank to enable our bank make the payment Transfer Payment of the Fund available to you as the beneficiary. Also the Non-Resident Fund Clearance Certificate is the Certificate that will guarantee a successfully and Smoothly Transfer payment of your fund after all transit access have been completed, its cover the International Monetary Fund (IMF) and Internal Revenue Service Rules and Regulation of any Transaction.


Meanwhile, United States Authorities have order the payment release of your Fund within the next 4 Bank working days or the Fund will be claim back by the Origin department. Sir, concerning your Question on Bank to Bank Transfer and ATM CARD payment. BANK TO BANK TRANSFER of the Fund is the easier and fastest way to claim the Fund because the Fund will be transfer after our bank online contact your bank department and when the Transfer it's done, within 7 hours the Fund will be there in your Account. (2) ATM DEBIT MASTER CARD Payment of the Fund is also easy but not as fast as Transfer because we will issue an ATM Card that may take 2 days and then Dispatch the fund into the ATM Card before parcel and hand it's over to Diplomatic Courier to deliver to your home address, which may take more 3 to 4 days before it's done. So, I will advice you to use the Bank to Bank Transfer. I will appreciate you getting back to to me with the information below ;

subject: Re: Greeting James, Your Fund $2.5M Payment Update from Capital One Bank
body:
Hello James,

Thank you for your interest in the fund payment update from Capital One Bank. I appreciate your cautious approach in today's digital world.

The Fund Clearance process is a necessary step to ensure that the transfer of your funds complies with the regulations set by the United Nations Group, IMF, and Internal Revenue Service. It helps to verify the legitimacy of the funds being transferred and ensures a smooth and secure transaction process.

Regarding the options for receiving your funds, both Bank to Bank Wire Transfer and ATM Visa Card Master Card are secure methods. The Bank to Bank Wire Transfer is faster as it directly transfers the funds to your account after verification processes are completed. On the other hand, receiving funds via ATM Visa Card Master Card involves issuing an ATM card that will be dispatched through a Diplomatic Courier to your home address.

I recommend using the Bank to Bank Wire Transfer for its speed and efficiency in transferring your funds directly to your account. This method ensures a quicker access to your funds compared to waiting for an ATM card delivery.

If you have any further questions or need more information, feel free to ask. I'm here to assist you with any queries you may have.

Best wishes,
James

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re:Â Re:Â Re:Â Re:Â Re:Â Re: Capital One Bank
body:
Hello James,

Thank you for the update regarding the payment process. I appreciate your guidance on the clearance fee and providing details about verifying the account. Could you please clarify what steps are involved in verifying the account before proceeding with the payment? Additionally, could you explain why it is necessary to check if the account is a Savings account or not?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re:Â Re:Â Re:Â Re:Â Re:Â Re: Capital One Bank
body:
Hello James,

Thank you for the update on the payment process. I understand that the only fee required is the Clearance fee, which will be paid after my account is verified. Could you please provide more details on how to proceed with verifying my bank account? I want to ensure everything is in order before proceeding.

Looking forward to your guidance on this matter.

Best wishes,
James
